meanings.definition: The ability to produce a desired or intended result.
meanings.sent1: Her efficaciousness in solving problems impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The team's efficaciousness in completing the project on time was commendable.
meanings.sent3: The magician's efficaciousness in pulling a rabbit out of a hat left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: His speech had an efficaciousness that ignited a spark of inspiration in the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The medicine's efficaciousness in curing the illness was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: The quality of being effective in achieving a specific goal.
meanings.sent1: The coach's efficaciousness in motivating the team led to their victory.
meanings.sent2: The efficaciousness of the new marketing strategy resulted in increased sales.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape fluttered behind him, symbolizing his efficaciousness in saving the city.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's efficaciousness in explaining complex concepts made learning easier for the students.
meanings.sent5: The detective's efficaciousness in solving the case quickly earned him a reputation for excellence.
